attributes.action: Hold a Public Inquiry into Child Grooming Gangs (Child Rape Gangs)
attributes.additional_details: This is a national disgrace and by not putting sufficient safeguards in place the abuse  was allowed to continue for decades.  Those responsible must be held accountable and as this is on a national scale it should not be left to local councils to investigate themselves. We need a Public Enquiry
attributes.background: We believe that the child victims of the Grooming/rape gangs of horrific attacks Rochdale, Rotherham, Telford etc. deserve justice and the truth as to why they were failed so badly by the legal and judiciary system as well as the State.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
